item.title: Rhone 和 Chatterjee 委托高盛领导朗玛斯科技在美国的首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Rhone 和 Chatterjee Group 已聘请以高盛集团为首的银行参与 Lummus Technology 在美国的首次公开募股。【原文：Private equity firm Rhone and the Chatterjee Group have hired banks led by Goldman Sachs Group Inc. for a US initial public offering of Lummus Technology, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 大举押注美国收益率上升的交易员面临至关重要的 CPI 数据
item.description: 自上周的就业报告公布以来，交易员们一直在为美国收益率走高下注，他们的信念最快将在周三受到最新通胀数据的考验。【原文：Traders who have been piling into wagers for higher US yields ever since last week’s jobs report will see their convictions tested as soon as Wednesday with the latest inflation readings.】

item.title: Lyft 公布第一季度低迷的预订量和利润展望
item.description: Lyft 公司发布了令人失望的第一季度总预订量展望，而竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. issued a disappointing first-quarter gross bookings outlook, following a similarly muted forecast from rival Uber Technologies Inc. citing impact from the extreme winter weather and LA wildfires.】

item.title: 第四季度业绩超预期，DoorDash 发布强劲订单展望
item.description: 美国最大的食品外卖服务公司 DoorDash 公司发布的第一季度订单前景超出了华尔街的预期，这再次表明消费者的需求仍然具有弹性。【原文：DoorDash Inc., the largest food delivery service in the US, issued an outlook for orders in the first quarter that surpassed Wall Street’s expectations, serving as yet another sign that consumer demand remains resilient.】

item.title: 首席执行官离职后，英国石油公司巴西负责人将接管生物能源部门
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）在巴西的负责人将接任该公司糖和乙醇部门的最高负责人，接替决定离开该公司的一位高管。【原文：The head of BP Plc in Brazil will take over as the top boss of the company’s sugar and ethanol unit, replacing an executive that decided to leave the firm.】

item.title: 墨西哥机场首席执行官吹嘘 "真正激进 "的投资计划
item.description: 洛斯卡沃斯、巴亚尔塔港和墨西哥其他旅游胜地的机场运营商正在将其五年支出计划增加到 520 亿比索（约合 25 亿美元），比最初宣布的数额增加了 20% 以上。【原文：The operator of airports in Los Cabos, Puerto Vallarta and other Mexican tourist destinations is increasing its five-year spending plan to 52 billion pesos ($2.5 billion), a boost of more than 20% from its initial announcement.】

item.title: 苹果公司在地图应用程序上将墨西哥湾更名为美国湾
item.description: 根据美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在上任第一天签署的行政命令，苹果公司将在其地图应用程序中把墨西哥湾更名为美国湾。【原文：Apple Inc. is renaming the Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America on its Maps app, following an executive order signed by US President Donald Trump on his first day in office.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称通胀率有望达到 2%，但需要时间
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，他预计通胀将继续放缓，向央行2%的目标迈进，但他警告说，与政策相关的不确定性给经济前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said he anticipates inflation will continue to slow toward the central bank’s 2% goal, but warned policy-related uncertainty clouds the economic outlook.】

item.title: 萨默斯认为存在 2021 年错误以来最大的通胀爆发风险
item.description: 四年前，美国前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）曾抨击美国财政和货币政策制定者过度刺激经济，导致一代人以来最大的通胀爆发风险。【原文：Four years after blasting US fiscal and monetary policymakers for excessive stimulus that risked the biggest inflation blowout in a generation, former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers warned there’s danger of another breakout in price pressures.】

item.title: 加密货币托管公司 BitGo 据称考虑最快今年上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，BitGo 公司正在考虑首次公开募股，加入了众多加密货币公司的行列，期待监管机构为其计划提供更多支持。【原文：BitGo Inc. is considering an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, joining a flood of crypto companies anticipating more support for their plans from regulators.】

item.title: 特斯拉解禁为期权交易商提供了对冲市场下跌的途径
item.description: 随着电动汽车制造商特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：As a post-election rally in the shares of electric-vehicle maker Tesla Inc. rapidly unwinds, some market watchers are spotting a lucrative trading opportunity.】

item.title: 肯-格里芬向埃隆-马斯克表示 "感谢"，抨击特朗普关税政策
item.description: Citadel 公司创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）说，他很感谢埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）从公司抽出时间来削减政府开支，但他对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统关于关税的言论提出了直言不讳的批评。【原文：Citadel founder Ken Griffin said he’s grateful that Elon Musk is taking time away from his companies to slash government spending but offered blunt criticisms of President Donald Trump’s rhetoric on tariffs.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔称欧洲央行减息无法解决欧洲的结构性问题
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，欧洲中央银行降低借贷成本无法解决该地区经济面临的结构性挑战。【原文：Reductions in borrowing costs by the European Central Bank can’t address the structural challenges facing the region’s economy, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的皮尔斯表示，该机构希望采用新方法制定加密货币政策
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会委员海丝特-皮尔斯（Hester Peirce）表示，华尔街监管机构正在仔细审查其针对加密货币公司提起的诉讼案件，因为该机构正试图就数字资产监管问题确定新的基调。【原文：US Securities and Exchange Commissioner Hester Peirce says the Wall Street watchdog is taking a close look at cases it has brought against crypto firms as it tries to strike a new tone on regulating digital assets.】

item.title: 法国银行认为经济增长放缓，不确定性高企
item.description: 法国央行表示，法国经济在今年年初仅将略有增长，企业领导人面临的不确定性仍然很高。【原文：France’s economy is heading for only slight growth at the start of the year and uncertainty remains high for business leaders, the country’s central bank said.】

item.title: 摩根大通第一季度交易和投资银行业务大幅增长
item.description: 摩根大通公司的交易收入和投资银行业务费用在第一季度的增幅都可能超过 10%，因为华尔街继续受益于波动性和资本市场的回暖。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s trading revenue and investment-banking fees could both rise more than 10% in the first quarter as Wall Street continues to benefit from volatility and a capital markets comeback.】

item.title: 产量增长强劲，全球石油供应过剩局面有望扩大
item.description: 美国预计今年和 2026 年的石油盈余将比之前预测的更大，原因是美国和非欧佩克国家的产量将继续增长，而且预计制裁不会影响俄罗斯的产量。【原文：The US expects bigger oil surpluses than it previously projected for this year and in 2026, driven by continued growth in American and non-OPEC production and projections that sanctions won’t likely dent Russian output.】

item.title: 特朗普之子支持朋友的细价股，促使股价暴涨 84
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的两个儿子正在投资一家总部位于特朗普大厦的小型、无利可图的生物技术公司，这家公司后来变成了一家投资银行。【原文：Two of President Donald Trump’s sons are investing in a small, unprofitable biotechnology firm-turned-investment bank headquartered in Trump Tower, adding to the first family’s growing list of business interests from within its own orbit.】

item.title: 把钱拿出来创纪录的金价是对顶级矿商的考验
item.description: 金价在历史高位徘徊，但巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp. ）和纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.接下来的 10 天将给这两家顶级生产商一个机会，以赢回持怀疑态度的股东。【原文：Gold prices are hovering around record highs, but Barrick Gold Corp. and Newmont Corp. have frustrated investors by failing to capitalize on bullion’s rally. The next 10 days gives the top producers a chance to win back skeptical shareholders.】

item.title: 财政部长称津巴布韦尚未准备好使用单一货币
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）说，这个南部非洲国家需要重新获得信贷额度，然后才能采用 ZiG 作为其唯一货币。【原文：Zimbabwe’s Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube said the southern African nation needs to regain access to credit lines before it can adopt the ZiG as its sole currency.】

item.title: Deliveroo 称创始首席执行官 Will Shu 不打算下台
item.description: Deliveroo Plc 创始人兼首席执行官威尔-舒（Will Shu）不打算下台，该公司发言人表示，此前有报道称董事会正在考虑接替他的人选。【原文：Deliveroo Plc founder and Chief Executive Officer Will Shu is not planning on stepping down, a company spokesperson said, following a report that the board is considering his replacement.】

item.title: 德意志交易所为 ISS Stoxx 首次公开募股征集标书
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse AS）已就其治理数据和分析部门 ISS Stoxx 可能进行的首次公开发行征求银行建议。【原文：Deutsche Boerse AS has asked for bank proposals for a potential initial public offering of its governance data and analytics unit ISS Stoxx, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大选临近，秘鲁银行为 2025 年末的波动做好准备
item.description: 距离秘鲁下届大选还有一年多的时间，但这已经让投资者感到担忧，银行现在已经发出了市场未来可能出现波动的信号。【原文：Peru’s next election is still more than a year away but it’s already worrying investors, with banks now flagging the potential for market volatility ahead.】

item.title: 中国发射对挑战马斯克 "星链 "至关重要的新型火箭
item.description: 中国的一枚新型火箭首次执行飞行任务，标志着中国政府在追赶埃隆-马斯克的 "星际链路"（Starlink）方面迈出了重要一步。【原文：A new Chinese rocket took off on its debut mission, marking a major step in Beijing’s effort to catch up with Elon Musk’s Starlink.】

item.title: 安大略基金减记对 Northvolt 的 4 亿美元投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安大略投资管理公司（Investment Management Corp. of Ontario）已经减记了对去年申请破产保护的电动汽车电池制造商 Northvolt AB 4 亿美元的投资。【原文：Investment Management Corp. of Ontario has written down its $400 million investment in Northvolt AB, the electric vehicle battery maker that filed for bankruptcy protection last year, according to people familiar with the matter.】
